entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
